feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-26T09:51:53.342202Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;当音乐产业在 20 世纪 80 年代对盒式磁带发动战争时</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openculture.com/2023/07/home-taping-is-killing-music-when -the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette-tape.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T07:51:40.493489Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.openculture.com/2023/07/home-taping-is-killing-music-when-the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette- Tape.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rcarmo</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn8.openculture.com/2023/07/24205918/tometaping.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 143px;" />;<br />;20 世纪 80 年代，英国臭名昭著的“家庭录音正在扼杀音乐”活动，目标是那些通过广播录制歌曲而不是购买唱片的人。然而，该活动收效甚微，被许多人视为胡言乱语。家庭录音和盒式磁带在当时的音乐消费和文化中发挥了重要作用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-the-music-industry-waged-war -on-the-cassette-tape-during-the-1980s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36874275" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;马克·沃森' Lisp 书籍</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mark-watson/free-older-books-and-software/tree/main/opencontent</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T00:51:40.494537Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/mark-watson/free-older-books-and-software/tree/main/opencontent"/>; <author>; <name>; KRAKRISMOTT</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KRAKRISMOTT</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Mark Watson 的 Lisp 书籍可供免费下载。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mark-watson-s-lisp-books" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844673" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;树形图非常棒</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.phronemophobic.com/treemaps-are-awesome.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T20:51:40.495370Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.phronemophobic.com/treemaps-are-awesome.html"/>; <author>; <name>;capableweb</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=capableweb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.phronemophobic.com/treemaps-are-awesome/images/sizes-example.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;树形图是一种未得到充分利用的可视化效果，它能够一般性地汇总多种形状和大小的数据。它们可以成为探索和导航混乱数据块的灵活工具。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#treemaps-are-awesome" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36868940" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Expo – 用于制作适用于 Android、iOS 和 Web 的通用应用程序的开源平台</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/expo/expo</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T00:51:40.496175Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/expo/expo"/>; <author>; <name>;andsoitis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =andsoitis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/expo/expo/main/.github/resources/banner.png" style="width: 220px; height: 202px;" />;<br />;Expo 是一个开源平台，用于制作在 Android、iOS 和 Web 上运行的通用本机应用程序。它包括通用运行时和库，可让您通过编写 React 和 JavaScript 来构建本机应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#expo-open-source-platform-for-making-universal-apps-for-android-ios-and-web" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36871651" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们对丰富的信念从何而来？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.discoursemagazine.com/abundance/2023/07/19/where-did-our-belief-in-abundance-come-from/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T05:51:40.49808 2Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.discoursemagazine.com/abundance/2023/07/19/where-did-our-belief-in-abundance-come-from/"/>; <作者>; <name>;elsewhen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elsewhen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.discoursemagaz ine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Abundance-Venice.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;西罗马灭亡后，罗马帝国的崩溃导致了一种衰败感，并相信人类的堕落已经蒙蔽了我们的感官和智慧。然而，文艺复兴和古希腊哲学和科学的重新发现激发了人们对自然的好奇心和对进步的信念。启蒙运动进一步挑战了既定的正统观念，并引发了对世界的实证研究，最终导致了皇家学会的成立和对有用知识的追求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#where-did-our-belief-in-abundance-come-from" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36856215" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;远远领先于时代：纽约远程休息室</stitle>; <id>;https://docpop.org/2013/10/way-ahead-of-its-time-the-remote-lounge-nyc/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:51:40.498874Z</updated>; <link href="https://docpop.org/20 13/10/way-ahead-of-its-time-the-remote-lounge-nyc/"/>; <author>; <name>;Ivoah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Ivoah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://docpop.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/console_images-e1381340 661499.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;The Remote Lounge 是 2001 年 10 月至 2007 年 11 月期间位于纽约包厘街的一家高科技酒吧。酒吧的噱头是里面挤满了监视器和闭路电视摄像机。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#way-ahead-of-its-time-the-remote-lounge-nyc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36857069" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人们什么时候不再喝醉了？</stitle>; <id>;https://lefinder.substack.com/p/when-did-people-stop-being-drunk</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T02:51:40.499648Z</updated>; <link href="https://lefinder.substack.com/p/when-did-people-stop- being-drunk"/>; <author>; <name>;prismatic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prismatic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3 .amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F6715ddc0-4491-419f-8a7b-9a5a94238399_1215x461.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：84px；" />;<br />;历史上酒精（尤其是啤酒）的消费量远高于现代消费量。过去，平均每个人每天消耗约一升啤酒，是现代啤酒饮用国家消耗量的四倍。过去纯酒精的消费量比现在至少高出2-4倍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-did-people-stop-being-drunk-all-the-time" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36850113" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;蓝鳍金枪鱼的壮丽</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/science/elements/the-magnificence-of-the-bluefin-tuna</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T00:51:40.500412Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/science/elements/the -magnificence-of-the-bluefin-tuna"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Petiver</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Petiver</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/64b7ff4f69af7f86491410d6/master/w_2560%2Cc_ limit/Galchen_Tuna.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;在赫尔曼·梅尔维尔的《白鲸》的第 45 章中，以实玛利讲述了鲸鱼被鱼叉刺中、逃脱，然后再次遭遇的实例。重遇鲸鱼的想法似乎很荒诞，但它突显了海洋及其生物的有限性。 Karen Pinchin 的文章《他们自己的海洋之王：金枪鱼、痴迷和我们海洋的未来》讲述了蓝鳍金枪鱼和人类追捕者的故事，重点介绍了金枪鱼渔民阿尔·安德森 (Al Anderson) 和被捕获了 3 次的金枪鱼阿米莉亚 (Amelia)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-magnificence-of-the-bluefin-tuna" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851107" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;在投诉 SPARC4 运行缓慢后被叫到教授办公室</stitle>; <id>;https://infosec.exchange/@paco/110772422266480371</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T09:51:40.501193Z</updated>; <link href="https://infosec.exchange/@paco/1107 72422266480371"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;一位教授抱怨他的 Sparc4 计算机运行缓慢。当 IT 支持人员进行调查时，他们发现速度缓慢是由教授的窗户下藏着蟑螂的恶作剧造成的，蟑螂逐渐繁殖并消耗 RAM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#got- Called-to-a-professors-office-after-a-complaint-his-sparc4-was-running-slow" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36857314" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HBM 的未来：必要但昂贵</stitle>; <id>;https://semiengineering.com/hbms-future-necessary-but-expense/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T01:51:40.501990Z</updated>; <link href="https://semi Engineering.com/hbms-future-necessary-but-expense/"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/semiengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/Fig01_Rambus_HBMstack.png?resize=1 594%2C916&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：127px；" />;<br />;高带宽内存 (HBM) 正在成为超大规模厂商的首选内存，但其在主流市场的最终命运仍存在疑问。虽然它具有紧凑的外形和高带宽，但与 HBM 相关的成本和散热挑战限制了其更广泛的采用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hbms-future-necessary-but-expense" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36871919" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;互联网自由区（1997）</stitle>; <id>;https://arachnoid.com/freezone/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T22:51:40.502744Z</updated>; <link href="https://arachnoid.com/freezone/"/>; <author>; <name>;davikr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=davikr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;互联网已被商业利益所占领，导致免费内容减少、质量下降。本网站致力于原始互联网，重视信息、程序和内容的自由交换。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-internet-free-zone-1997" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36860488" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;本地运行 Llama 2 指南</stitle>; <id>;https://replicate.com/blog/run-llama-locally</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:51:40.504250Z</updated>; <link href="https://replicate.com/blog/run-llama-locally"/>; <author>; <name>;bfirsh</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=bfirsh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://replicate.com/static/blog/run-llama-locally/llama-captain.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;您可以在 M1/M2 Mac、Windows、Linux 甚至手机上本地运行 Llama 2，无需连接互联网。您可以使用三种开源工具在自己的设备上运行 Llama 2：Llama.cpp、Ollama 和 MLC LLM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#guide-to-running-llama-2-locally" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865495" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;PRQL：管道式关系查询语言</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/PRQL/prql</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T18:51:40.505010Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/PRQL/prql"/>; <author>; <name>;animal_spirits</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=animal_spirits</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c4ec6198e5445cfa52d83958a5d1be5fbd83409a2cdebb3bb7d1ad180cd053a2/68747470733a2f2f636f6e74726 9622e726f636b732f696d6167653f7265706f3d5052514c2f7072716c"样式="宽度：220像素；高度：92像素；" />;<br />;PRQL 是一种用于转换数据的现代语言 — 一种简单、强大、流水线的 SQL 替代品。它形成了转换的逻辑管道，支持变量和函数等抽象，并且可以与任何使用 SQL 的数据库一起使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#prql-pipelined-relational-query-language" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36866861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：圆桌会议 (YC S23) – 使用 AI 模拟调查</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865625</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:51:40.505805Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36 865625"/>; <author>; <name>;timshell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=timshell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Roundtable 使用 LLM 来模拟调查，提供廉价且快速的结果。通过对精心策划的调查数据集进行法学硕士培训，他们可以构建人类行为和观点的通用模型。这些模拟已经过实证验证并显示出有希望的结果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-roundtable-yc-s23-using-ai-to-simulate-surveys" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Digikey 物理连接器教程</stitle>; <id>;https://www.digikey.com/en/articles/connector-tutorial</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T20:51:40.506566Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.digikey.com/en/articles/connector-tutorial"/>; <author >; <name>;dragontamer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dragontamer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.digikey.com/-/media/Images/Article%20Library/TechZone%20Articles/2017/September/Connector%20Tutorial/article-2017september-connector-tu torial-fig1.jpg?ts=42192405-2a3e-4a3c-811b-9ef2498d1852&h=216&w=600&la=en-US" style="宽度：220px；高度：80px；" />;<br />;连接器是电路的重要组成部分，因为它们提供了快速有效的方法来连接电路的不同部分。它们有助于减少制造时间，并根据具体应用进行选择。矩形连接器（例如 XHP-2）常用于 PCB 板上，具有用于连接电线的公头和母头插座。不同系列的连接器可使用不同的触点，包括线规和电镀选项。还提供预压接引线和工具，以便更轻松地进行原型设计和生产。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#digikey-s-physical-connectors-tutorial" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36858076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;命令行谋杀之谜（2014）</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/veltman/clmystery</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T20:51:40.507329Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/veltman/clmystery"/>; <author>; <name>;smartmic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=smartmic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/d9a3e38b5d48f2723d33ef91448d98ed2ce2b431b3a6426b11dd2799d132ecb8/veltman/clmystery" style="width: 220px; height: 11 0像素；” />;<br />;打开终端，转到文件所在位置，然后首先阅读文件“说明”。要开始了解如何使用命令行，请打开 cheatsheet.md 或 cheatsheet.pdf。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-command-line-murder-mystery-2014" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36868978" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;18 世纪的电子邮件：光学电报 (2007)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lowtechmagazine.com/2007/12/email-in-the-18.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T23:51:40.508072Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.lowtechmagazine. com/2007/12/email-in-the-18.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;eatonphil</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eatonphil</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.lowtechmagazine.com/images/2007/12/23/copy_optical_telegraph_tower_4.jpg" style="width: 220 像素；高度：313 像素；" />;<br />;200多年前，光电报可以实现高速无线远距离通信，无需电力。它由一个塔网络组成，电报员使用望远镜逐个符号传输编码信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#email-in-the-18th- century-the-optical-telegraph-2007" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36861004" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;第一个室温常压超导体？</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.12008</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T16:51:40.508828Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.12008" />; <author>; <name>;Akronymus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Akronymus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;我们成功合成了具有改性铅磷灰石结构的室温超导体LK-99。 LK-99的超导性是由于Cu$^{2+}$取代Pb$^{2+}$(2)离子引起的轻微体积收缩，从而在界面中产生超导量子阱。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-first-room-Temperature-ambient-Pressure-superconductor" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36864624" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;超链接极繁主义（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://thesephist.com/posts/hyperlink/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:51:40.509600Z</updated>; <link href="https://thesephist.com/posts/hyperlink/"/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thesephist.com/img/notation-highlights.png" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;超链接最大化主义的思想是一切都应该是超链接，包括单词、短语、引用、名称、段落、文档和文档集合。作者提出了一种解决方案，让读者的计算机按需生成链接，从而实现无缝且互连的信息网络。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hyperlink-maximalism-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36866242" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Google 放弃将 Assistant 智能扬声器迁移到紫红色的工作</stitle>; <id>;https://9to5google.com/2023/07/25/google-abandons-assistant-speakers-fuchsia/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T00:51:40.512619Z</updated>; <link href="https://9to5google.com/2023/07/2 5/google-abandons-assistant-speakers-fuchsia/"/>; <author>; <name>;thecosmicfrog</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thecosmicfrog</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://9to5google.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/10/google_nest_audio_sand_2 .jpg?quality=82&strip=all&w=1600" style="宽度：220px；高度：111px；" />;<br />;在这项工作首次被发现后不到一年，谷歌就放弃了将其 Assistant 智能音箱系列升级到 Fuchsia 操作系统的计划。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-abandons-work-to-move-assistant-smart-speakers-to-fuchsia" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36871673" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Invoice Dragon – 用于创建 PDF 发票的开源应用</stitle>; <id>;https://invoicedragon.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T11:51:40.513375Z</updated>; <link href="https://invoicedragon.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;lanijuyi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lanijuyi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;使用 Invoice Dragon 轻松创建专业发票和收据，并以 PDF 格式下载，以便于共享和记录保存。而且这一切都是免费的！ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-invoice-dragon-an-open-source-app-to-create-pdf-invoices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36860898" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mathematica Journal 不再接受提交</stitle>; <id>;https://www.mathematica-journal.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T21:51:40.514196Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.mathematica-journal.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;Ra felMri</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RafelMri</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://content.wolfram.com/uploads/sites/19/2023/06/Vol-23-thumb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 284px;" />;<br />;虽然 The Mathematica Journal 不再接受投稿，但 Wolfram 社区每天都会发表类似深度的文章，包括来自多元化且知识渊博的受众的参与。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mathematica-journal-is-no-longer-accepting-submissions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36869486" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Netlify 帐户已被暂停且无追索权</stitle>; <id>;https://answers.netlify.com/t/my-netlify-account-ha-been-suspended-i-dont-know-why/97537</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T04:51:40.514934Z</updated>; <link href=" https://answers.netlify.com/t/my-netlify-account-ha-been-suspended-i-dont-know-why/97537"/>; <author>; <name>;kaishiro</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaishiro</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://global.discourse-cdn.com/netlify/original/3X /0/f/0f1edea4ebd6ad1bb5a2d5217248cf171e011473.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;身份验证错误 由于以下错误，身份验证失败：我们已有使用此电子邮件地址的注册用户。登录并连接您的 GitHub 帐户。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#netlify-accounts-are-being-suspended-with-no-recourse" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36872876" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Octox：受 xv6-riscv 启发的 Rust 类 Unix 操作系统</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/o8vm/octox</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:51:40.516404Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/o8vm/octox"/>; <author>; <name>;o8vm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=o8vm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1aa9584e6c812c231ad6aeb525954b1afff7ac723b40f65f096566a634e00a1f/6874747073 3a2f2f7668732e636861726d2e73682f7668732d364d51424979416f33447042724152427848784c33352e676966“样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：144像素；” />;<br />;octox 是一个用纯 Rust 实现的类 Unix 操作系统，受到 xv6-riscv 的启发。它遵循 xv6 的结构和风格，包括一个简单的 shell 和一个名为 ulib 的用户库。该系统允许用户开发自己的命令并添加新的系统调用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#octox-unix-like-os-in-rust-inspired-by-xv6-riscv" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865682" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
